mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS t_trans_urls ( id BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT, trans_id BIGINT, trans_url VARCHAR(1024), trans_url_param VARCHAR(1024), create_time TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , update_time TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (id)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;;
mapper.select: SELECT id, trans_id, trans_url, trans_url_param, create_time, update_time FROM t_trans_urls WHERE trans_id = #{transId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY create_time LIMIT 1000
